1.0.name: wordpress/anmiated-twitter-bird
1.0.description: This plugin adds an animated flying twitter bird in your blog. If you move the mouse over the bird, a "tweet this" -and displays a "follow me" button. The bird found itself as the "follow me" link on the Twitter account. In addition to this a balloon with your latest tweet can be displayed optionally. The original script for this plugin is designed by http://floern.com, released under GNU/GPL.More Details at Plugin Support Page
